main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @vchFullSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: View [dbo].[vw_DimDistributions] Script Date: 09/19/2012 17:29:31 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[vw_DimDistributions]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vw_DimDistributions] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL = ' /****** Object: View [dbo].[vw_DimDistributions] Script Date: 09/19/2012 17:12:34 ******/ CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_DimDistributions] AS
SELECT * FROM DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDistributions WITH (NOLOCK) '
SET @vchFullSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @vchFullSQL EXEC (@vchFullSQL)
